mapper.select: SELECT t1.hospitalcode, t3.hospitalname, t2.equipmenttypeid, t2.equipmenttypename, t1.isvisible, t1.alwayalarm, t1.timeout, t1.timeouttime FROM hospitalequiment t1 LEFT JOIN monitorequipmenttype t2 ON t1.equipmenttypeid = t2.equipmenttypeid LEFT JOIN hospitalofreginfo t3 ON t1.hospitalcode = t3.hospitalcode
